dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.cfs.CustomerFacingServiceSpec
dataStructure.description:
A CustomerFacingServiceSpec defines the properties (attributes) common to a particular CustomerFacingService used to realize the associated Product(s). This entity serves as a common basis to build any set of CustomerFacingServices that the service provider needs.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerFacingServiceSpec

child.name: productSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ProdSpecRealizedAsCFServiceSpec

This association end is optional
child.label: productSpecification

child.label: customerFacingServiceSpecRole

child.label: customerFacingServiceSpecVersion
